title: Breaking Off the Engagement… Bring it on! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Broken Engagement   Calm Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cross-dressing   Dense Protagonist   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: Meiri   メイリ
description: One day, I was called out by my fiance, the first prince, Leon-sama and asked to come to the gardens of the royal palace. When I got there, Leon-sama and a lovely woman who clung to him awaited me… eh? He wants to break off the engagement? Wouldn’t that mean I won’t have to receive that severe queen’s training? Great!>
